messages: edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:23): wait, tweakers.net said Firefox 5 is released
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:23): mozilla.com however says something different
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:24): ah I see, they link to the ftp server
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:24): for which you have to have login credentials
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:24): good times
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:24): oh well, release builds are boring anyways
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:25): I think it's released on Mon or Tue
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (16:25): But yeah, that just means it's obsolete :)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:26): aaah
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:27): David has a @mozilla.com address
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:27): guess that means he has even more time to provide awesome reviews :)
5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (16:36): Awesome fast /irc-logs/ is awesome \o/
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:39): awesome krijn is awesome
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:39): as long as it works anyway
5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (16:40): Why didn't I do it like this before..
5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (16:41): Ah, right, HTML5 wasn't supported in browsers yet
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:43): meh
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:43): parts of HTML5 were in browsers before you started web development :p
5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (16:44): <image> for sure
5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (16:44): Permission to let you people be again? :]
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:44): charset registry is another failure it seems
5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (16:44): (And stop breaking my server!)
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:44): half a year!
5b67d980ae4c3c82251106e26913ce67 (16:45): See you tomorrow edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e o/

edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:48): 8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81, one day Web Encodings will be an actual document that can be implemented
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (16:48): problem might be that nobody cares or dares touching that code

edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:00): 8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81, btw, you made a change where you described something in terms of appendChild or some such; given mutation events I'm not sure that's a good idea

b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (17:03): notes that the mutation events of innerHTML are described like that
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (17:05): I'm hoping smaug wins
